verses.kjv: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.
verses.ct: Now brothers and sisters, there's no need for me to write to you about specific times and dates.

verses.kjv: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.
verses.ct: You already know very well that the day of the Lord will arrive like a thief in the night.

verses.kjv: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.
verses.ct: While people are saying, 'Everything is peaceful and secure,' destruction will hit them suddenly, like labor pains strike a pregnant woman, and there will be no way for them to escape.

verses.kjv: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
verses.ct: But you, brothers and sisters, are not living in darkness, so that day won't catch you off guard like a thief.

verses.kjv: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
verses.ct: Every one of you belongs to the light and belongs to the day. We don't belong to the night or to darkness.

verses.kjv: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
verses.ct: So then, let's not fall asleep like everyone else. Instead, let's stay alert and clear-headed.

verses.kjv: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.
verses.ct: Those who sleep do their sleeping at night, and those who get drunk do their drinking at night.

verses.kjv: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
verses.ct: But since we belong to the day, let's stay clear-headed, wearing faith and love as our chest armor, and the hope of salvation as our helmet.

verses.kjv: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
verses.ct: God did not choose us to face his wrath but to receive salvation through our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.kjv: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
verses.ct: who died for us so that whether we are alive or dead, we will live together with him.

verses.kjv: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.
verses.ct: That is why you should encourage each other and build one another up — which is exactly what you're already doing.

verses.kjv: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;
verses.ct: We ask you, brothers and sisters, to recognize those who work hard among you, who lead you in the Lord, and who correct you.

verses.kjv: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work’s sake. And be at peace among yourselves.
verses.ct: Show them the highest respect and love because of the work they do. Live at peace with one another.

verses.kjv: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
verses.ct: We urge you, brothers and sisters: warn those who are lazy, encourage the discouraged, help the weak, and be patient with everyone.

verses.kjv: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
verses.ct: Make sure that nobody pays back wrong with wrong. Instead, always pursue what is good for each other and for everyone.

verses.kjv: Rejoice evermore.
verses.ct: Be joyful at all times.

verses.kjv: Pray without ceasing.
verses.ct: Never stop praying.

verses.kjv: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
verses.ct: Give thanks in every situation, because this is what God wants for you in Christ Jesus.

verses.kjv: Quench not the Spirit.
verses.ct: Don't suppress the Holy Spirit.

verses.kjv: Despise not prophesyings.
verses.ct: Don't dismiss prophecies.

verses.kjv: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
verses.ct: Test everything carefully, and hold on to what is good.

verses.kjv: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
verses.ct: Stay away from every form of evil.

verses.kjv: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: May the God of peace himself make you completely holy, and may your entire spirit, soul, and body be kept without fault until the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
verses.ct: The one who calls you is faithful, and he will make it happen.

verses.kjv: Brethren, pray for us.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, pray for us.

verses.kjv: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.
verses.ct: Greet all the brothers and sisters with a holy kiss.

verses.kjv: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.
verses.ct: I insist in the Lord's name that this letter be read to all the brothers and sisters.

verses.kjv: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
verses.ct: May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
